code: import axios from"axios";const API_URL="/api";export const login=async(username,password)=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/auth/login"),{username,password});return res.data.token;};export const getChartData=async(chartName,token)=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/chart/").concat(chartName),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return res.data;};
